definition: to face sth/to be confronted with
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: Canada is meanwhile getting older and its population is shifting westwards.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大面臨人口老齡化，人口重心也在西移。

sentences.english: Staggering tasks confronted the people of the United States , North and South , when the Civil War ended.
sentences.chinese: 內戰結束後，美國南北方的人民都面臨着艱鉅的任務。

sentences.english: We think it’s possible that your company is at risk in this area as well.
sentences.chinese: 因而我們認爲貴司在這個領域也可能面臨同樣的風險。

sentences.english: But the weak states remain vulnerable to a loss of confidence by depositors.
sentences.chinese: 一旦儲戶信心喪失，弱國仍將面臨巨大風險。

sentences.english: One of the most common problems for scientists was money.
sentences.chinese: 科學家面臨的最常見問題之一就是金錢。

sentences.english: Similarly a few years know that we are facing employment problems.
sentences.chinese: 同理可知再過幾年我們所面臨的就業問題。

sentences.english: Now the "angry river" is under a dual-threat from both soil erosion and a new dam project.
sentences.chinese: 怒江正面臨着水土流失和新建大壩的雙重威脅。

sentences.english: In China, the Chinese enterprises are faced with the foreign brands catering enterprises to squeeze.
sentences.chinese: 在國內，中餐企業面臨着外國品牌餐飲企業的擠壓。

sentences.english: The link is the growing strain on the world"s sole superpower. America is locked into a draining and demoralising war."
sentences.chinese: 這個聯繫就是全球唯一超級大國面臨的壓力日益增加。

sentences.english: Underground engineering is frequently threatened by ground water irruption.
sentences.chinese: 地下工程常常面臨突水災害的威脅。

sentences.english: Their whole political life has been about a rough and tumble campaign, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 他們的整個政治生活中一直面臨着種種造謠中傷。

sentences.english: Food prices pose a serious challenge to society at large.
sentences.chinese: 全社會面臨這食品價格的嚴峻挑戰。

sentences.english: The prospect of bankruptcy of his company beetled over the general manager.
sentences.chinese: 總經理面臨他的公司破產的陰暗前景。

sentences.english: There was pressure on the university to disinvest in south africa.
sentences.chinese: 這所大學面臨在南部非洲縮減投資的壓力。

sentences.english: Three is the farmer enters a city faced with surmounts "the quality barrier" with difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 三是農民進城面臨難以跨越的“素質屏障”。

sentences.english: So as I face tomorrow with its problems large and small.
sentences.chinese: 故我面臨的遭遇，不論大小的難處。
